casebody.data:
Tasha GRIGGS, Individually and on Behalf of Her Minor Son, Austin Griggs
v.
BOUNCE N' AROUND INFLATABLES, L.L.C. and Jack Alan Leblanc NO. 2018-C-0726 Supreme Court of Louisiana. March 26, 2019 Rehearing denied. JOHNSON, C.J., would grant for the reasons previously assigned. HUGHES, J., would grant.
